communityPage.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with chess enthusiasts, join tournaments, and improve your skills at StrateZone!

loginPage.title: Log in
loginPage.welcomeMessage: Welcome back! Please enter your details.

signupPage.title: Sign Up
signupPage.description: Create your account by filling in the information below.

forgotPassword.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.

footer.exclusiveOffer: Don't miss out on this exclusive offer that will end soon.

heroBanner.description: StrateZone is an app that connects chess enthusiasts, making it easy to find suitable opponents, schedule games at the club, join exciting courses, and participate in events.

ChessContent.scheduleGames: Schedule individual or group chess games with players who match your skill level and preferred time.
ChessContent.xiangqiDescription: Immerse yourself in the ancient art of Chinese Chess, where strategic placement and tactical moves determine the winner.
ChessContent.goDescription: One of the oldest board games, Go offers endless possibilities and requires deep strategic thinking to dominate the board.
ChessContent.chessDescription: A timeless classic, Chess challenges players to outthink their opponents with strategy and foresight. Perfect for players of all skill levels.
ChessContent.scheduleGamesDescription: Schedule individual or group chess games with players who match your skill level and preferred time.

CourseContent.JoinExpertLedClasses: Join our expert-led classes to enhance your chess skills, whether you're a beginner or an advanced player. Courses available for Chess, Xiangqi, and Go
CourseContent.ChessForBeginnersDescription: This course covers the basics of chess, including rules, piece movements, strategies, and basic tactics. Whether you're a complete beginner or looking to refresh your knowledge, this course is the perfect starting point.
CourseContent.IntermediateChessStrategiesDescription: Learn advanced strategies and techniques for playing chess at a higher level. This course covers tactics, opening principles, middle game strategies, and endgame techniques.
CourseContent.GoTheArtOfStrategyDescription: Explore the ancient game of Go. Learn the rules, basic strategies, and how to think ahead in this profound and deep game of strategy. Perfect for those who enjoy challenging and intellectual games.

ChessApointment.bannerDescription: Connect with chess enthusiasts, join tournaments, and improve your skills at StrateZone!
